title: Collision Radius on Syndra's Q-E is terrible

replies.body: so this is why syndra has seen such less play? people are whining that they cant land a slightly more difficult skillshot? that must be why noone plays nami either, or maybe just that nobody plays support

Yeah they nerfed it a bit a while ago but recently they were meant to be fixing it and it's actually got a terrible hitbox - it used to bug out at the end of the Q ranged and have like no AOE whatsoever but now the collision width has been reduced or something on its trave path and its literally as thin as Ezreals Q.
Got nerfed aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaages ago. That's why I stopped playing her.
